programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 8 Mustangs (11-1) and No. 17 Tigers (9-3) meet for the first time, in the ACC championship game. SMU went 8-0 in-conference in its first ACC campaign. Clemson plays in its 10th ACC final, losing in 2009 and winning eight from 2011 to 2022.

programme.title: Authentic ACC
programme.desc: In this edition of the series produced by SMU Athletics, get an inside look at Spring Football for the 2025 SMU Mustangs.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The premier matchup in Week 0 of the NCAA football season sees the No. 10 Seminoles face the Yellow Jackets. Florida State added former Clemson quarterback DJ Uiagalelei as a graduate transfer from Oregon State to help defend its ACC championship.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 18 Panthers are 7-0 for the first time since 1982 as they play the No. 20 Mustangs. Pittsburgh is 3-0 in conference after three defensive TDs in a 41-13 demolition of Syracuse. SMU has won five in a row after surviving Duke 28-27 in overtime.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 8 Hurricanes (5-0, 1-0 ACC) travel to play the Golden Bears (3-1, 0-1). Heisman Trophy candidate Cam Ward tossed four TD passes, including the last two scores of the game, to lead Miami to a 38-34 comeback win over Virginia Tech on Sept. 28.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: Tobacco Road rivals link up in Chapel Hill, N.C., as the Wolfpack visit the Tar Heels. NC State can lock both teams up at 6-6, and 3-5 in ACC play, with a win. North Carolina leads the rivalry series 68-39-6, but NC State has won 12 of the past 17.

programme.title: Authentic ACC
programme.desc: In this edition of the series produced by North Carolina Athletics, get an inside look at Spring Football for the 2025 UNC Tar Heels.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 8 Mustangs (11-1) and No. 17 Tigers (9-3) meet for the first time, in the ACC championship game. SMU went 8-0 in-conference in its first ACC campaign. Clemson plays in its 10th ACC final, losing in 2009 and winning eight from 2011 to 2022.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Seminoles visit the Mustangs. Florida State snapped a surprising three-game skid to begin 2024 by outlasting California 14-9 in Week 4. Brashard Smith scored four times to help SMU capture a wild Iron Skillet matchup with TCU, 66-42 on Sept. 21.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Orange host the No. 23 Yellow Jackets. Kyle McCord threw for four TDs in his Syracuse debut, a 38-22 win over Ohio. Georgia Tech went to Dublin to beat Florida State on a late field goal, and won 35-12 in its home opener versus Georgia State.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Orange host the No. 23 Yellow Jackets. Kyle McCord threw for four TDs in his Syracuse debut, a 38-22 win over Ohio. Georgia Tech went to Dublin to beat Florida State on a late field goal, and won 35-12 in its home opener versus Georgia State.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Tar Heels (4-4, 1-3 ACC) visit the Seminoles (1-7, 1-6). North Carolina snapped a four-game slide by smashing Virginia 41-14 on Oct. 26. Florida State is having its worst season since 1974, two years before legendary coach Bobby Bowden took over.

programme.title: ACC Legends: Frank Beamer
programme.desc: Frank Beamer is a legend at Virginia Tech, where he played for the Hokies, then built Virginia Tech into a powerhouse as a head coach from 1987-2015. Follow Beamer from his start all the way to being inducted into the College Football Hall of Fame.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: A Cardinal clash pits Stanford against No. 19 Louisville in the first meeting between the ACC foes. Louisville secured bowl eligibility with a 33-21 upset win over then-No. 11 Clemson prior to its bye Nov. 2. Stanford wraps up its 2024 home slate.

programme.title: ACC Legends: Rondé & Tiki Barber
programme.desc: Witness Tiki & Rondé Barber's journey from Roanoke to the University of Virginia and beyond, and how to this day, their bond is as strong as ever.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Blue Devils visit the Yellow Jackets. On Sept. 28, Duke erased a 20-0 deficit by scoring 21 unanswered to capture the Victory Bell versus North Carolina. The Devils are off to their first 5-0 start since 1994. Georgia Tech is 2-0 at home.

programme.title: Greatest Ever: 2018 Clemson Tigers
programme.desc: Clemson's journey through the College Football Playoff semifinal and championship games with never before seen footage and interviews with the Clemson coaching staff.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Panthers and Mountaineers contest another edition of the Backyard Brawl. The schools have traded wins since reigniting the rivalry in 2022 after West Virginia's 17-6 home victory last year. Pittsburgh is 2-0 after edging out Cincinnati in Week 2.

programme.title: ACC Legends: Bobby Bowden
programme.desc: Chronicling the career of legendary Florida State football coach Bobby Bowden.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: A Cardinal clash pits Stanford against No. 19 Louisville in the first meeting between the ACC foes. Louisville secured bowl eligibility with a 33-21 upset win over then-No. 11 Clemson prior to its bye Nov. 2. Stanford wraps up its 2024 home slate.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: Another leg of the Commonwealth Clash gets underway when Virginia Tech hosts Virginia. The Cavaliers lead the ongoing 2024-25 Clash 5-0. However, the Hokies have won three straight meetings on the gridiron, and 22 of the past 24 overall.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Cardinal begin their ACC era by squaring off against the Orange for the first time. Syracuse quarterback Kyle McCord threw for at least 350 yards and four TDs in both wins this year, including a Sept. 7 decision against then-No. 23 Georgia Tech.

programme.desc: A senseless double murder lands a California man on death row; despite the harsh sentence, a broken system surrounding the death penalty leaves everyone feeling that justice hasn't been served.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Indefensible
programme.desc: A senseless double murder lands a California man on death row; despite the harsh sentence, a broken system surrounding the death penalty leaves everyone feeling that justice hasn't been served.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Look Into My Eyes
programme.desc: At North Port High School in Florida, three students die within months of each other; as the community learns more, they discover a common thread: all three students were hynotized by their principal, Dr. George Kenney, not long before they died.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Look Into My Eyes
programme.desc: Dr. George Kenney begins to reveal his side of the story; as details emerge about the deaths and Marcus, Wesley and Brittany's parents speak out, an investigation into Kenney's hypnosis practice begins; the North Port community grows suspicious.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Look Into My Eyes
programme.desc: The press catches wind of the story and it captures headlines worldwide; Dr. Kenney is asked to leave North Port High, and as the criminal trial heats up, the community is split on his culpability; a student comes forward with a new perspective.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Look Into My Eyes
programme.desc: Pressure mounts against the school board to take accountability; Dr. Kenney leaves North Port for what seems like the final time; the community grapples with guilt and grief; Stephen offers an intimate look into Kenney's hypnosis practice.

programme.title: The Furry Detectives: Unmasking A Monster
programme.desc: When Patch O'Furr is tagged in a mysterious online post, he must face the fact that animal abusers are hiding in plain sight in the Furry Fandom; Furry Detectives comb through evidence and discover one popular Youtuber is a suspect.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young man whose childhood was marked by tragedy learns of a relatively unknown serial killer, and finds himself thinking about unidentified victims; it isn't long before that pursuit becomes a full-time job and identifying victims an obsession.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young mother is found unresponsive in bed, and her cause of death is determined to be an accidental heroin overdose; but her family questions everything about the circumstances around her death, so they launch their own investigation.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young mother is found unresponsive in bed, and her cause of death is determined to be an accidental heroin overdose; but her family questions everything about the circumstances around her death, so they launch their own investigation.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young man leaves home for the corner store, but dies on a rainy sidewalk just down the street; bystanders claim that he fell off of his bike, but his mom and sister don't buy it; they hit the streets to find answers.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young girl's life was thrown into chaos when her single mother died by a gunshot wound in their remote mountain home; the journey for the truth would be long and arduous, and it would be thirty years until justice was finally served.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: When a college student was found dead in rural Quebec, police refused to call it a murder; but years later, her brother continues his own investigation into her death; on the eve of a trip to return to the scene of the crime, tragedy strikes again.

programme.title: The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park

programme.desc: The NYPD identifies a dead girl in Central Park as Jennifer Levin; the search for her killer leads to her prep school friend Robert Chambers; Robert confesses he killed Jennifer Levin accidentally during rough sex.

programme.title: The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park

programme.title: The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park

programme.title: The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park

programme.title: Cold Blooded: The Clutter Family Murders

programme.title: Cold Blooded: The Clutter Family Murders

programme.title: Cold Blooded: The Clutter Family Murders

programme.title: Cold Blooded: The Clutter Family Murders

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: After a teenage girl is found murdered in her car on the side of a highway, a stranger from out of town is convicted of her murder; when the deputy who originally discovered the body becomes sheriff, he calls everything into question.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: When the body of a missing student is discovered in the river near a small college town, the community questions the role law enforcement may have played in his death.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
